original_text: Now John wore a garment of camel's hair and a leather belt around his waist, and his food was locusts and wild honey.
korean_text: 이 요한은 낙타털 옷을 입고 허리에 가죽 띠를 띠고 음식은 메뚜기와 석청이었더라

sentences.original_text: Now John wore a garment of camel's hair
sentences.korean_translation: 요한은 낙타 털로 만든 옷을 입었고

sentences.original_text: and a leather belt around his waist
and his food was locusts and wild honey.
